allow:
Bash(git commit -m "$(cat <<''EOF''
Sync localStorage data to Supabase for AI Insights

Add protocol sync mechanism to fix AI Insights showing "0 protocols, 0 dose logs"
despite having data in the UI. The issue was that the frontend stores data in
localStorage while AI features query Supabase.

- Add /api/protocols/sync endpoint to sync protocols from localStorage
- Add useProtocolsSync hook mirroring existing dose logs sync pattern
- Update insights page to sync protocols and dose logs before generating
- Show sync status during analysis generation
